Sql.query: delete from IIO_OSIG_FACTURA_UL where psiclicodi = :psiclicodi and TRIM(ULFACTCODEMPRESA) = TRIM(:ulfactcodempresa)
select nvl(max(ulogcodi), 0) + 1 as correlativo from iio_log_importacion

UPDATE IIO_OSIG_FACTURA_UL tmp SET tmp.PTOMEDICODI = ( SELECT pto.PTOMEDICODI FROM ME_PTOMEDICION pto , EQ_EQUIPO eqp WHERE pto.EQUICODI = eqp.EQUICODI AND eqp.FAMCODI = 45 AND eqp.EQUIESTADO IN ('A', 'B') AND eqp.OSINERGCODI = tmp.ULFACTCODSUMINISTRO AND pto.ORIGLECTCODI = 19 AND pto.PTOMEDIESTADO = 'A' AND pto.EMPRCODI = tmp.EMPRCODI
) WHERE tmp.PSICLICODI = :PSICLICODI AND NVL(tmp.PTOMEDICODI,0) = 0 AND TRIM(tmp.ULFACTCODEMPRESA) IN ({0})

UPDATE IIO_OSIG_FACTURA_UL tmp SET tmp.EMPRCODI = ( SELECT EMPRCODI FROM SI_EMPRESA E WHERE E.EMPRESTADO = 'A' AND E.EMPRCODOSINERGMIN = tmp.ULFACTCODEMPRESA ) WHERE tmp.PSICLICODI = :PSICLICODI AND NVL(tmp.EMPRCODI,0) = 0 {0}

insert into IIO_OSIG_FACTURA_UL( psiclicodi, ulfactcodempresa, ulfactcodsuministro, ulfactmesfacturado, ulfactcodbrg, ulfactcodpuntosuministro, ulfactcodareademanda, ulfactpagavad, ulfactprecenergbrghp, ulfactprecenergbrgfp, ulfactprecpotenbrg, ulfactconsenergactvhpps, ulfactconsenergactvfpps, ulfactmaxdemhpps, ulfactmaxdemfpps, ulfactpeajetransmprin, ulfactpeajetransmsec, ulfactfpmpoten, ulfactfpmenerg, ulfactfactgeneracion, ulfactfacttransmprin, ulfactfacttransmsec, ulfactfactdistrib, ulfactfactexcesopoten, ulfactfacturaciontotal, ulfactconsenergreacps, ulfactppmt, ulfactpemt, ulfactfactptoref, ulfactvadhp, ulfactvadfp, ulfactcargoelectrificarural, ulfactotrosconceptosnoafecigv, ulfactotrosconceptosafectoigv, emprcodi, ptomedicodi, ulfactusucreacion, ulfactfeccreacion ) values ( :psiclicodi, :ulfactcodempresa, :ulfactcodsuministro, :ulfactmesfacturado, :ulfactcodbrg, :ulfactcodpuntosuministro, :ulfactcodareademanda, :ulfactpagavad, :ulfactprecenergbrghp, :ulfactprecenergbrgfp, :ulfactprecpotenbrg, :ulfactconsenergactvhpps, :ulfactconsenergactvfpps, :ulfactmaxdemhpps, :ulfactmaxdemfpps, :ulfactpeajetransmprin, :ulfactpeajetransmsec, :ulfactfpmpoten, :ulfactfpmenerg, :ulfactfactgeneracion, :ulfactfacttransmprin, :ulfactfacttransmsec, :ulfactfactdistrib, :ulfactfactexcesopoten, :ulfactfacturaciontotal, :ulfactconsenergreacps, :ulfactppmt, :ulfactpemt, :ulfactfactptoref, :ulfactvadhp, :ulfactvadfp, :ulfactcargoelectrificarural, :ulfactotrosconceptosnoafecigv, :ulfactotrosconceptosafectoigv, :emprcodi, :ptomedicodi, :ulfactusucreacion, :ulfactfeccreacion )
SELECT ULFACTCODSUMINISTRO FROM IIO_OSIG_FACTURA_UL WHERE PSICLICODI = :PSICLICODI AND (PTOMEDICODI IS NULL OR PTOMEDICODI = 0) {0}

INSERT INTO IIO_FACTURA(PSICLICODI,EMPRCODI,EQUICODI,UFACMESFACTURADO,UFACCODBRG,UFACCODPUNTOSUMINISTRO,UFACIDAREADEMANDA, UFACPAGAVAD,UFACPRECENERGBRGHP,UFACPRECENERGBRGFP,UFACPRECPOTENBRG,UFACCONSENERGACTVHPPS,UFACCONSENERGACTVFPPS,UFACMAXDEMHPPS, UFACMAXDEMFPPS,UFACPEAJETRANSMPRIN,UFACPEAJETRANSMSEC,UFACFPMPOTEN,UFACFPMENERG,UFACFACTGENERACION,UFACFACTTRANSMPRIN, UFACFACTTRANSMSEC,UFACFACTDISTRIB,UFACFACTEXCESOPOTEN,UFACFACTURACIONTOTAL,UFACCONSENERGREACPS,UFACPPMT,UFACPEMT,UFACFACTPTOREF, UFACVADHP,UFACVADFP,UFACCARGOELECTRIFICACIONRURAL,UFACOTROSCONCEPTOSNOAFECTOIGV,UFACOTROSCONCEPTOSAFECTOIGV, PTOMEDICODI) SELECT PSICLICODI,F.EMPRCODI,P.EQUICODI,ULFACTMESFACTURADO,ULFACTBARRCODIBRG,ULFACTBARRCODIPTOSUMIN,ULFACTCODAREADEMANDA, ULFACTPAGAVAD,ULFACTPRECENERGBRGHP,ULFACTPRECENERGBRGFP,ULFACTPRECPOTENBRG,ULFACTCONSENERGACTVHPPS,ULFACTCONSENERGACTVFPPS,ULFACTMAXDEMHPPS, ULFACTMAXDEMFPPS,ULFACTPEAJETRANSMPRIN,ULFACTPEAJETRANSMSEC,ULFACTFPMPOTEN,ULFACTFPMENERG,ULFACTFACTGENERACION,ULFACTFACTTRANSMPRIN, ULFACTFACTTRANSMSEC,ULFACTFACTDISTRIB,ULFACTFACTEXCESOPOTEN,ULFACTFACTURACIONTOTAL,ULFACTCONSENERGREACPS,ULFACTPPMT,ULFACTPEMT,ULFACTFACTPTOREF, ULFACTVADHP,ULFACTVADFP,ULFACTCARGOELECTRIFICARURAL,ULFACTOTROSCONCEPTOSNOAFECIGV,ULFACTOTROSCONCEPTOSAFECTOIGV, F.PTOMEDICODI FROM IIO_OSIG_FACTURA_UL F JOIN ME_PTOMEDICION P ON P.PTOMEDICODI = F.PTOMEDICODI WHERE PSICLICODI = :PSICLICODI AND F.PTOMEDICODI > 0 {0}
SELECT ULFACTCODSUMINISTRO FROM IIO_OSIG_FACTURA_UL WHERE PSICLICODI = :PSICLICODI AND (PTOMEDICODI IS NULL OR PTOMEDICODI = 0) {0}

insert into iio_log_importacion(ulogcodi,ulogusucreacion,ulogfeccreacion,ulogproceso, ulogtablaafectada, ulognroregistrosafectados,ulogmensaje,psiclicodi,ulogtablacoes,ulogidregistrocoes,ulogtipoincidencia,rcimcodi) select {0}+rownum,t.* from ( select '{1}',sysdate,'SICLI',ULFACTCODEMPRESA as tablaafectada,count(*),'No se ha encontrado la empresa con codigo '|| '''' || ULFACTCODEMPRESA || '''' , '{2}','SI_EMPRESA',ULFACTCODEMPRESA,2, MAX(ci.RCIMCODI) from iio_osig_factura_ul f join iio_control_importacion ci on ci.psiclicodi = f.psiclicodi AND TRIM(ci.rtabcodi) = '{3}' AND TRIM(rcimempresa) = TRIM(ULFACTCODEMPRESA) where f.psiclicodi = :psiclicodi and (f.emprcodi is null OR f.emprcodi = 0) AND ULFACTCODEMPRESA IN ({4}) group by ULFACTCODEMPRESA) t

insert into iio_log_importacion(ulogcodi,ulogusucreacion,ulogfeccreacion,ulogproceso, ulogtablaafectada, ulognroregistrosafectados,ulogmensaje,psiclicodi,ulogtablacoes,ulogidregistrocoes,ulogtipoincidencia,rcimcodi) select {0}+rownum,t.* from ( select '{1}',sysdate,'SICLI',ULFACTCODEMPRESA as tablaafectada,count(*),'No se encontro el Punto de Medicion para el cliente: '|| ULFACTCODSUMINISTRO , '{2}','SI_EMPRESA',ulfactcodsuministro,1, MAX(ci.RCIMCODI) from iio_osig_factura_ul f join iio_control_importacion ci on ci.psiclicodi = f.psiclicodi AND TRIM(ci.rtabcodi) = '{3}' AND TRIM(rcimempresa) = TRIM(ULFACTCODEMPRESA) where f.psiclicodi = :psiclicodi and (f.ptomedicodi is null OR f.ptomedicodi = 0) AND ULFACTCODEMPRESA IN ({4}) group by ULFACTCODEMPRESA, ULFACTCODSUMINISTRO) t

UPDATE IIO_CONTROL_IMPORTACION SET RCIMESTADOIMPORTACION = 0 WHERE TRIM(RCIMEMPRESA) IN ({0}) AND PSICLICODI = :psiclicodi AND TRIM(RTABCODI) = '{1}' AND (NVL(RCIMNROREGISTROS,0) <> NVL(RCIMNROREGISTROSCOES,0) OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM iio_log_importacion I WHERE RCIMCODI = IIO_CONTROL_IMPORTACION.RCIMCODI) )

UPDATE IIO_CONTROL_IMPORTACION SET RCIMESTADOIMPORTACION = 1 WHERE TRIM(RCIMEMPRESA) IN ({0}) AND PSICLICODI = :psiclicodi AND TRIM(RTABCODI) = '{1}' AND RCIMNROREGISTROS = RCIMNROREGISTROSCOES AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM iio_log_importacion I WHERE RCIMCODI = IIO_CONTROL_IMPORTACION.RCIMCODI )
UPDATE IIO_CONTROL_IMPORTACION SET RCIMNROREGISTROSCOES = RCIMNROREGISTROS WHERE PSICLICODI = {0} AND TRIM(RTABCODI) = TRIM('{1}') AND TRIM(RCIMEMPRESA) IN ({2})
update iio_periodo_sicli set psiclifecsincronizacion = sysdate where psiclicodi = :psiclicodi
select NVL(count(*),0) as Registros from iio_control_importacion where psiclicodi = :psiclicodi and nvl(rcimestadoimportacion,0) = 0 and TRIM(rtabcodi)='TMP_CLI_TABLA05'
